comments.body: Since you're copying this from https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/staging/src/k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/generate/versioned/env_file.go I'd expect that file being removed. Same applies to `env_file_test.go`. The leftovers should use the new util functions you're exposing here.

I don't think this can be removed yet because the create secret uses this same function (and it's not migrated from the dependency of generators yet).

Unless we change the create_secret generated version also, and when removing generator dependency, migrate the file at once :)

Oh I've read the last phrase later. 

So yeah, agree :D 

@lauchokyip do as Maciej asked please, remove the old env_file and env_file_test.go and please change on the secret.go (from the generated version)

Thanks!
